languages.text: "Где-то в душе я знала: только мне под силу отыскать путь к месту последнего упокоения святой Ардженты. Теперь... мой долг исполнен".
"Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."
languages.original_text: "Где-то в душе я знала: только мне под силу отыскать путь к месту последнего упокоения святой Ардженты. Теперь... мой долг исполнен".

traits.locale_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

languages.text: “在我内心深处，我知道，只有我才能找到通往圣阿洁塔安息之地的道路。如今……我的职责完成了。”
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: “在我内心深处，我知道，只有我才能找到通往圣阿洁塔安息之地的道路。如今……我的职责完成了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je savais au plus profond de mon cœur que j'étais la seule à pouvoir trouver le lieu où repose Sainte Argenta. J'ai accompli mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: « Je savais au plus profond de mon cœur que j'étais la seule à pouvoir trouver le lieu où repose Sainte Argenta. J'ai accompli mon devoir. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «En mi corazón sabía que solo yo podría encontrar el camino al lugar de descanso de santa Argenta. Y ahora... mi deber ha terminado».
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: «En mi corazón sabía que solo yo podría encontrar el camino al lugar de descanso de santa Argenta. Y ahora... mi deber ha terminado».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「心のどこかで、私だけが聖アルジェンタの眠る場所への道を見つけることができるとわかっていた。これで…私の義務は果たした」
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: 「心のどこかで、私だけが聖アルジェンタの眠る場所への道を見つけることができるとわかっていた。これで…私の義務は果たした」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Tief in meinem Herzen wusste ich, dass ich allein in der Lage war, den Weg zur letzten Ruhestätte der Heiligen Argenta zu finden. Nun ... ist meine Pflicht vollbracht."
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: "Tief in meinem Herzen wusste ich, dass ich allein in der Lage war, den Weg zur letzten Ruhestätte der Heiligen Argenta zu finden. Nun ... ist meine Pflicht vollbracht."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

languages.text: "Yüreğimin derinliklerinde bir yerde, Azize Argenta'nın ebedî istirahatgâhını tek başıma bulabileceğimi biliyordum. Artık... Görevim tamamlanmış oldu."
languages.original_text: "Somewhere in my heart, I knew that I alone was capable of finding the way to the final resting place of Saint Argenta. Now... my duty is done."

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğimin derinliklerinde bir yerde, Azize Argenta'nın ebedî istirahatgâhını tek başıma bulabileceğimi biliyordum. Şimdi görevimi tamamladım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
